name: Creature Catacombs
description:
Creature Catacombs is a simplistic beat-em-up about going across multiple floors of small dungeons and fighting enemies.

Arrow Keys or ESDF to move.

Z or N to lay an egg. Eggs will explode

X or M to rotate the animal train. Rotation temporarily makes the train invincible but slows it down temporarily. Laying an egg during rotation will launch it in the direction the train is facing. Pressing Z towards the end of the animation will launch it farther.
